valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Sat 25 Oct 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Sun 26 Oct 2025
general_synopsis: Slow moving low Fisher 980 expected 981 by 1800 Saturday. Lows FitzRoy 1009 and Lundy 995 losing their identities by same time
